lead_paragraph: Kara Lawson scored 22 points, Nicole Powell had 21 and DeMya Walker added 17 — each reaching career playoff highs — to lead the Monarchs past the Detroit Shock.
snippet: Kara Lawson scored 22 points, Nicole Powell had 21 and DeMya Walker added 17 — each reaching career playoff highs — to lead the Monarchs past the Detroit Shock.
